Text:
Considering The spoken language of even the north american release was spanish, I highly doubt the spoken language in this one is english. 
This makes me doubt the english subs being in the mkv (or hardcoded)

The spoken language is spanish.
the subtitles are not hardcoded and there are 18 different possible texted languages.
if you want to know download the sample

11.08 GiB that's too big! 
but the sample looks great.
Please somebody turn this into 3.99 Gb or 4 to be able to watch it on PS3!!!

Phenomenal upload, pristine quality.
Indeed, you can choose between many different subs.
